text: Groupe Lactalis S.A. is a French multinational dairy products company, owned by the Besnier family and based in Laval, Mayenne, France. It was formerly known as Besnier S.A.. Lactalis is the largest dairy products company in the world and is the second largest food company in France, after Danone. It was founded in 1933. == Other websites == * Category:1933 establishments in Europe Category:1930s establishments in France Category:Food companies of France Category:Mayenne
title: Lactalis
